fish.payara.nucleus.requesttracing

Class RequestTracingService

  • java.lang.Object
    • fish.payara.nucleus.requesttracing.RequestTracingService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, org.jvnet.hk2.config.ConfigListener

    @Service(name="requesttracing-service")
@RunLevel(value=10)
public class RequestTracingService
extends Object
implements EventListener, org.jvnet.hk2.config.ConfigListener
    Main service class that provides methods used by interceptors for tracing requests.
    Author:
    mertcaliskan
